name: linuron
source: Hughes LD; Palmer DS; Nigsch F and Mitchell JBO. 2008 Why are some properties more difficult to predict than others? A study of QSPR models of solubility; melting point and LogP. J. Chem. Inf. Model. 2008. 48 (1). pp 220?460
Reason: 1,2,3,4,5,6-hexachlorocyclopentane has a melting point of 100.0 degrees Celsius. The basic unit of analysis is cyclopentane, which has a melting point of 10.0 degrees Celsius. The chlorine atoms increase the melting point due to their ability to participate in hydrogen bonding and increase molecular weight. Each chlorine atom can be estimated to add approximately +20 degrees Celsius to the melting point.
